name: Monkey Miners DX
description:
NEW MODE; FINAL BUILD

The game now has a Linux build, tested on Ubuntu 14.0.  You can only use Xbox controllers on the Linux version.

You can shake out of the poop trap now by wiggling the left analogue stick.  That poop shake...

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

NEW BUILD

I juiced up the game a good bit for Escape Velocity at the beginning of September, 2017.

Here's the build from then.

The game is getting a new mode and more juice.  That version (with Mac and Linux support) will be released in the next couple of weeks.  At that point, the game will no longer be free.  Enjoy!

Mine for gold in Monkey See, Monkey Doo, then spend it on powerups during Simian Shakedown!

Up to 4 players can play with DualShock4 controllers!

Art - Jason Schloss

Programming, Design - Sean Brady

Programming, Design - Eric Guadara
